name: Prime Minister Special Scholarship Scheme (PMSSS)
eligibility: Domicile of J&K, Passed 10+2 from JKBOSE/CBSE in J&K or Diploma, Income < 8 lakh, Admission outside J&K only
benefits: Up to ₹3 lakh/yr fees + ₹1 lakh maintenance
how_to_apply: Register online at AICTE PMSSS portal

name: Post Matric Scholarship for SC/OBC/EBC/PC/DNT Students
provider: Directorate of Social Welfare Jammu, Govt. of J&K
eligibility: Domicile of J&K, SC/OBC/EBC/PC/DNT, Post-matric in recognized institutions, income-based
how_to_apply: Apply through State Portal online application

name: KEI High School & PG Scholarship Program
provider: Kashmir Education Initiative (KEI) & Iqbal Memorial Trust
eligibility: Class 9 with >75%, PG in Govt. inst., merit/income-based
benefits: Financial assistance for high school and PG
how_to_apply: Online application at KEI portal

name: Combined Counselling Board (CCB) Scholarship, J&K
eligibility: UG/PG admissions in/outside J&K
how_to_apply: Apply via CCB website, submit choices online

name: Jammu and Kashmir SC/ST Pre/Post Matric Scholarship
eligibility: Pre: Class 9/10 SC <2.5L, Post: 11-PhD SC <2.5L, ST as per scheme
how_to_apply: Apply on National Scholarship Portal (NSP)

name: Reliance Foundation Undergraduate Scholarships
eligibility: Undergraduate students in India
how_to_apply: Online application at official site

name: JKBOCW Educational Assistance Scheme
provider: J&K Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board
eligibility: Children of registered construction workers, Class 7-12
how_to_apply: Apply via official JKBOCW portal

name: Kotak Kanya Scholarship
eligibility: Meritorious girls in 1st year graduation
how_to_apply: Apply online

name: HDFC Bank Parivartan ECSS Scholarship
eligibility: UG/PG/school students, merit-cum-need

eligibility: 1st year of 3-year degree course, all DU colleges

name: G.P. Birla Scholarship
eligibility: Class 12 passed with >85% (State) or >90% (ISC/CBSE), family income <₹3L/year

eligibility: Female, Class 12 Science, >85%, family income <₹6L, pursuing BSc/Engg/Med

name: Santoor Scholarship Program
eligibility: Girls, passed 12th from govt school, pursuing UG full-time

eligibility: Engineering undergraduates

name: Panasonic Ratti Chhatr Scholarship
eligibility: B.Tech 1st year, top IITs and selected colleges

eligibility: Indian degree holder, accepted at foreign PG degree course

provider: JN Tata Endowment for the Higher Education of Indians
